message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1200000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1350000. This still gives you a good price and allows me to get closer to my desired value.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1350000, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1300000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
